title: Executive Operations & Marketing Coordinator
job_overview:
We are hiring on behalf of a US-based founder looking for a smart, proactive, and systems-savvy Executive Operations & Marketing Coordinator. This is not an entry-level VA role — we’re looking for someone who can think, organize, and execute across multiple areas of the business.

What You’ll Own:
Write and publish SOPs based on video walkthroughs

Manage meetings: invites, follow-ups, and task tracking

Prepare monthly reports, management dashboards, and QuickBooks journal entries

Upload sales and client data into HubSpot for dashboard creation

Track Coastal Accounting referral fees and sales commissions

File and contract cleanup projects

Monitor HubSpot tickets and escalate as needed

Coordinate gifts, flowers, and thoughtful client touches

Marketing & Admin Support:
Support marketing lead with repetitive tasks

Update webinar pages and websites

Post videos to YouTube, update blogs, pull analytics

Assist with newsletters, social posts, and webinar emails

Schedule holiday and quarterly reminder emails

People & Client Success:
Schedule weekly check-ins (breakfast/lunch) with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers

Support internal development planning

Prep and schedule one client meeting per week — research needs, identify opportunities, and support follow-through

Must-Have Qualifications:
Relevant Work Experience in admin, ops, or EA roles

Software & Technical Proficiency (HubSpot, QuickBooks, Google Workspace, Zoom, ClickUp, etc.)

Remote Work Experience & Adaptability

Excellent English (spoken and written)

Professionalism, Ownership, and Positive Attitude

Fast Response Time & Clear Communication

Dependable Internet, Quiet WFH Setup & Backup Power

Commitment to Part-time US Hours

Time Management & Dependability

Problem-Solving Skills & Initiative

Willingness to Learn, Improve & Adapt

Time Tracking:
Yes, required — we use Hubstaff.

If you’re highly organized, tech-savvy, and ready to be the behind-the-scenes driver of a fast-moving business, apply now. Only sharp, detail-driven applicants will be considered.
